00036 /*
00037  * Initialize the class members.
00038  */
00039 void CopyNumberResultWriter::Init()
00040 {
00041     maxProbeSetNameLength.clear();
00042     numberProbeSets = 0;
00043     numberCytoRegions = 0;
00044         numberGenotypeProbeSets = 0;
00045     bufferWriter = NULL;
00046 }
00047 
00048 /*
00049  * Clear the buffer.
00050  */
00051 void CopyNumberResultWriter::Clear()
00052 {
00053     maxProbeSetNameLength.clear();
00054     numberProbeSets = 0;
00055     numberCytoRegions = 0;
00056         numberGenotypeProbeSets = 0;
00057     algName.clear();
00058     algVersion.clear();
00059     programName.clear();
00060     programVersion.clear();
00061     programCompany.clear();
00062     columns.clear();
00063         genotypeColumns.clear();
00064         cytoRegionColumns.clear();
00065     algParams.clear();
00066     summaryParams.clear();
00067     chrStartStop.clear();
00068     outputFiles.clear();
00069     if (bufferWriter != NULL)
00070         delete bufferWriter;
00071     bufferWriter = NULL;
00072 }
00073 
00074 /*
00075  * Create a results file with the CEL file header and other parameters.
00076  */
00077 void CopyNumberResultWriter::CreateResultFile(affymetrix_fusion_io::FusionCELData& cel, const std::string& fileName)
00078 {
00079     try
00080     {
00081         // Create the results file with the header.
00082         CHPMultiDataData *data = new CHPMultiDataData(fileName);
00083         data->SetEntryCount(CopyNumberMultiDataType, numberProbeSets, maxProbeSetNameLength[CopyNumberMultiDataType], columns);
00084                 if (numberCytoRegions > 0)
00085                         data->SetEntryCount(CytoMultiDataType, numberCytoRegions, maxProbeSetNameLength[CytoMultiDataType],cytoRegionColumns);
00086                 if (numberGenotypeProbeSets > 0)
00087                         data->SetEntryCount(GenotypeMultiDataType, numberGenotypeProbeSets, maxProbeSetNameLength[GenotypeMultiDataType], genotypeColumns);
00088         data->SetAlgName(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(algName));
00089         data->SetAlgVersion(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(algVersion));
00090         data->SetArrayType(cel.GetChipType());
00091         GenericDataHeader *gdh = data->GetFileHeader()->GetGenericDataHdr();
00092         ParameterNameValueType param;
00093         param.SetName(PROGRAM_NAME);
00094         param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(programName));
00095         gdh->AddNameValParam(param);
00096         param.SetName(L"program-version");
00097         param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(programVersion));
00098         gdh->AddNameValParam(param);
00099         param.SetName(PROGRAM_COMPANY);
00100         param.SetValueText(StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(programCompany));
00101         gdh->AddNameValParam(param);
00102         ParameterNameValueTypeList params = algParams;
00103         param.SetName(L"ArraySet");
00104         param.SetValueText(cel.GetChipType());
00105         params.push_back(param);
00106         data->AddAlgParams(params);
00107         data->AddSummaryParams(summaryParams);
00108         DataSetHeader *dsh = data->GetDataSetHeader(CopyNumberMultiDataType);
00109         for (ParameterNameValueTypeList::iterator it=chrStartStop.begin(); it!=chrStartStop.end(); it++)
00110             dsh->AddNameValParam(*it);
00111         GenericData *gdata = cel.GetGenericData();
00112         if (gdata != NULL)
00113             gdh->AddParent(*gdata->Header().GetGenericDataHdr());
00114         CHPMultiDataFileWriter *writer = new CHPMultiDataFileWriter(*data);
00115         delete writer;
00116         delete data;
00117 
00118         // Create a buffer writer object
00119         outputFiles.clear();
00120         outputFiles.push_back(fileName);
00121         vector<MultiDataType> dataTypes;
00122         dataTypes.push_back(CopyNumberMultiDataType);
00123                 if (numberCytoRegions > 0)
00124                         dataTypes.push_back(CytoMultiDataType);
00125                 if (numberGenotypeProbeSets > 0)
00126                         dataTypes.push_back(GenotypeMultiDataType);
00127         bufferWriter = new CHPMultiDataFileBufferWriter();
00128         bufferWriter->Initialize(&outputFiles, dataTypes, maxProbeSetNameLength);
00129     }
00130     catch (CalvinException &ex)
00131     {
00132         string err = "Error creating the output file: " + fileName;
00133         wstring msg = ex.ToString();
00134         if (msg.empty() == false)
00135             err += " " + StringUtils::ConvertWCSToMBS(msg);
00136         throw err;
00137     }
00138     catch (...)
00139     {
00140         string err = "Error creating the output file: " + fileName;
00141         throw err;
00142     }
00143 }
00144 
00145 /*
00146  * Flush the buffer and close the file.
00147  */
00148 void CopyNumberResultWriter::CloseResultsFile()
00149 {
00150     if (bufferWriter != NULL)
00151     {
00152         bufferWriter->FlushBuffer();
00153         delete bufferWriter;
00154     }
00155     bufferWriter = NULL;
00156 }
00157 
00158 /*
00159  * Write the entry to the buffer.
00160  */
00161 void CopyNumberResultWriter::WriteProbeSetResult(const ProbeSetMultiDataCopyNumberData& entry)
00162 {
00163     bufferWriter->WriteMultiDataCopyNumberEntry(CopyNumberMultiDataType, 0, entry);
00164 }
00165 
00166 /*
00167  * Write the entry to the buffer.
00168  */
00169 void CopyNumberResultWriter::WriteGenotypeProbeSetResult(const ProbeSetMultiDataGenotypeData& entry)
00170 {
00171     bufferWriter->WriteMultiDataGenotypeEntry(GenotypeMultiDataType, 0, entry);
00172 }
00173 
00174 /*
00175  * Write the entry to the buffer.
00176  */
00177 void CopyNumberResultWriter::WriteCytoRegionResult(const ProbeSetMultiDataCytoRegionData& entry)
00178 {
00179     bufferWriter->WriteMultiDataCytoRegionEntry(CytoMultiDataType, 0, entry);
00180 }
00181 
00182 /*
00183  * Store the start index and count of probe sets for the given chromosome.
00184  */
00185 void CopyNumberResultWriter::SetChromosomeProbeSetIndexInformation(u_int8_t chr, int startIndex, int count)
00186 {
00187         ostringstream str;
00188         str << (int) chr;
00189     wstring schr = StringUtils::ConvertMBSToWCS(str.str());
00190     ParameterNameValueType param;
00191     param.SetName(schr + L":start");
00192     param.SetValueInt32(startIndex);
00193     chrStartStop.push_back(param);
00194     param.SetName(schr + L":count");
00195     param.SetValueInt32(count);
00196     chrStartStop.push_back(param);
00197     param.SetName(schr + L":display");
00198     param.SetValueAscii(ChromosomeToString(chr));
00199     chrStartStop.push_back(param);
00200 }
